entry.value: INSERT INTO db_config ( application_id, job_id, database_name, table_name, partition_size, column_to_partition, hdfs_parent_dir ) VALUES ( '${md.application_id}', '${md.job_id}', '${md.database_name}', '${md.table_name}', '${md.partition_size}', '${md.column_to_partition}', '${md.hdfs_parent_dir}' );

inputPorts.name: Get Configuration

entry.value: SELECT application_id, job_id, database_name, table_name, partition_size, column_to_partition, hdfs_parent_dir FROM db_config WHERE job_id='${jobid}';
